title: Frank Darabont's The Shawshank Redemption with Rhett Miller
itunes:title: Frank Darabont's The Shawshank Redemption with Rhett Miller
itunes:subtitle: Some birds aren't meant to be caged. In the latest installment of The Long Watch, the Losers get busy living and get busy talking about Frank Darabont's The Shawshank Redemption. Joining them on the prison yard is Old 97's singer-songwri...
description:
Some birds aren't meant to be caged. In the latest installment of The Long Watch, the Losers get busy living and get busy talking about Frank Darabont's The Shawshank Redemption. Joining them on the prison yard is Old 97's singer-songwriter and author Rhett Miller. Together, they leave no black, volcanic rock unturned as they wrestle with the universal truths behind the 1994 classic.


Want to see Rhett live? Catch one of his online shows via StageIt.


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
